general_advisory: Seedling treatment with 0.2% Chloropyriphos for 10-12 hours to control stemborer in the main field if granular insecticides have not been applied previously in the nursery. Complete the transplanting of 3-5 week old seedlings in well puddled soil at a spacing of 15cm x 15cm with 3-4 seedlings per hill at shallow depth. In bacterial blight endemic areas, dip the seedling roots in 0.1% Plantomycin solution before transplanting. Apply recommended basal doses during final puddling. Apply granular herbicide for farmers who have completed transplanting. Set up pheromone traps for monitoring pests. Follow irrigation schedule depending on soil moisture conditions. Apply recommended fertilizers and manage pest and disease control based on crop specifics.

advisory: Post-emergence Weed Management: Follow specific herbicide application as recommended based on weed types.
Bud Necrosis: Spray recommended pesticides to manage Thrips infestation.
Aphid Control: Use recommended pesticides based on pest stage.
Aphid Control: Utilize Neem-based pesticides followed by chemical solutions for best results.
Alternaria Leaf Spot: Manage disease with specific fungicides based on current weather conditions.
Cut Worm Control: Apply appropriate insecticides to control cut worm infestation.
